data.name: Tom Clancy's The Division™ - Parade Pack
data.detailed_description:
Keep the streets of New York safe with these prestigious suits and weapon skins. This bundle includes:
• Police Parade Set
• FNYC Parade Set
• Gemstone Amethyst Weapon Skin
• Glitch Barrium Weapon Skin
• Safari Monteverde Weapon Skin
data.about_the_game:
Keep the streets of New York safe with these prestigious suits and weapon skins. This bundle includes:
• Police Parade Set

data.short_description: Keep the streets of New York safe with these prestigious suits and weapon skins.
data.supported_languages:
English*, French*, Italian*, German*, Spanish - Spain*, Czech, Dutch, Hungarian, Japanese*, Korean, Polish, Portuguese - Brazil*, Traditional Chinese, Simplified Chinese, Russian*
*languages with full audio support

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows® 7, Windows 8.1, Windows 10 (64-bit versions only)
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows® 7, Windows 8.1, Windows 10 (64-bit versions only)
